name: No Bake Single Serve Chocolate Cream Berry Pie - Fireworks Pie
recipeIngredient: 2 Tablespoons ground almonds (Or coconut flakes for nut-free version)
1 teaspoon almond milk or non dairy milk
2-3 Tablespoons So delicious coconut milk yogurt or Cashew cream
1 teaspoon ground raw sugar or maple syrup or sweetener of choice

recipeInstructions.text: Melt the chocolate in a double boiler or microwave. Add in almond milk, liquor extract, or spices of choice and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the ground almonds and coconut flakes and mix to distribute.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the mixture into a tart/pie pan and spread evenly.

recipeInstructions.text: Place pan in the freezer for 15 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, mix yogurt, sugar and spices of choice.

recipeInstructions.text: Take the pan out and spread the spiced yogurt on top.

recipeInstructions.text: Top with sliced berries. Make a flag or an exploding firework display.
